75477F4049E3E798E067F98F5187DC7A: Find me in the land of The Ninja.
4D2EE2264824E3BDFFF204AA8101DAF1: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the elements locked within.
CA9A81534D795EC9D42E86B454B6F5FD: These ferocious fire bears have flame-imbued pelts used in crafting Ninja gear. Drawn to the heat of the sun, these creatures can often be found during the day.
